attributes.action: abolish the present three inflation indexes and revert to just one.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At present landlords by law can increase rents by using the Retail Price Index whereas the government uses its guide the CPI to determine rises in pensions, wages etc. This anomaly is especially harsh for OAP's as many of them live in rented accomodation and in particular it affects mobile home sites because the act in 1983 to prevent excessive rises was drafted before the new measures of inflation were invented.
